MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the KA2 area of Kilmarnock, affecting properties in Vernon Place and surrounding areas. It has been necessary for our engineers to carry out an emergency shutdown at 2:35pm due to third party damage to our underground electricity network outside 14 Parkthorn View and this may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:30pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 3:14pm on Saturday, 10 April 2021
